}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:09:30.000
    | text      = A lot of Alex's focus seems to be on the upcoming Second Amendment rally in Richmond, Virginia,

{{TranscriptBlock

}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:09:43.000
    | text      = But there's a little more depth in his bullshit than immediately meets the eye,
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:09:47.000
    | text      = and I think it's wise or worthwhile for our purposes to take a look at it.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:09:52.000
    | text      = But in order to start things off, I feel like it would be best to take a little moment
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:09:55.000
    | text      = to discuss the lead-up to this Richmond rally and how things got to the point where we are right now.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:10:02.000
    | text      = As we've discussed a little bit in the past, there have been some messiness going on in Virginia.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:10:07.000
    | text      = Oh, where?
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:10:08.000
    | text      = It's a bit of an oversimplification to put it this way,
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:10:11.000
    | text      = but a pretty simple explanation for what got us where we are right now is that the 2019 Virginia elections happened.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:10:18.000
    | text      = In that election cycle, all 140 of the seats in the Virginia Senate and House of Representatives
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:10:23.000
    | text      = were up for reelection.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:10:25.000
    | text      = Democrats had a net gain of two seats in the Senate, which gave them a 21 to 19 majority.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:10:30.000
    | text      = In the House, the Democrats won a 55 to 45 majority,
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:10:34.000
    | text      = thus giving them control of both houses of the state legislature for the first time in 26 years.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:10:39.000
    | text      = This naturally led to the right wing becoming completely paranoid about what would come.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:10:44.000
    | text      = In an article in the Virginia Mercury, members from the new Democratic majority made it pretty clear
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:10:48.000
    | text      = that the largest focus of their agenda was going to be reshaping voter access laws,
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:10:53.000
    | text      = taking on redistricting, repealing voter ID laws, and passing a no-excuse-needed early voting for everyone.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:11:00.000
    | text      = It's currently in the system it is now.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:11:02.000
    | text      = You can early vote, but you have to give a vote.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:11:04.000
    | text      = You have to justify it.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:11:05.000
    | text      = Right, right. That seems weird.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker

{{TranscriptBlock

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:11:26.000

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:11:31.000

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker

}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:11:39.000

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:11:43.000
    | text      = the Democratic Party just had a better policy set that appealed to more people right now in Virginia.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:11:49.000

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:11:54.000

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:12:00.000

}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:12:02.000

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:12:30.000

{{TranscriptBlock

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:12:48.000

}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker

}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker

    | name      = Unknown Speaker

}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:13:04.000

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:13:18.000

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:13:26.000

{{TranscriptBlock

{{TranscriptBlock

{{TranscriptBlock

}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker

{{TranscriptBlock

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:14:16.000

{{TranscriptBlock

{{TranscriptBlock

{{TranscriptBlock

{{TranscriptBlock

{{TranscriptBlock
